heading: HB06177
0:
AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF TWO BILLION AND SIXTY MILLION PESOS 
(P2,060,000,000.00) AS SUPPLEMENTAL BUDGET TO ADDRESS THE RISKS OF THE 2019-NCOV TO PUBLIC HEALTH
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2020-02-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06177
FULL TITLE : AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF TWO BILLION AND SIXTY MILLION PESOS (P2,060,000,000.00) AS SUPPLEMENTAL BUDGET TO ADDRESS THE RISKS OF THE 2019-NCOV TO PUBLIC HEALTH
ABSTRACT : Provides for funding and budgetary requirements for disease control and prevention which shall be used for the following: a) Persons Under Investigation ( P U Is ); b) Health Care Workers; c) Personal Protective Equipment ( P P E's ) for Health Care Workers; d) D O H cost estimates for 40 repatriates; and e) additional man hour service, and additional health care contractual workers or job orders.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SALCEDA, JOEY SARTE
DATE FILED : 2020-02-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Chatto (000 2020-02-10)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS ON 2020-02-05
